info.name: 01. Micro-Contacts_Mains
info.description:
RESTful microservice in charge of managing the contacts mains of a certain entity, some of the entities it includes are :

- Address
    
- Contact
    
- Social Media

item.name: ADDRESS
item.description: It is an entity that represents a physical address, some of its attributes are :
